item.title: Async Programming
item.author: Author
item.description: Async Porgramming What is async programming? Async programming is about non-blocking execution between functions. It enables your program to start a potentially long-running task and still be able to be responsive to other events while that task runs, So we donâ€™t have to wait our time waiting for that long task to be finished Example Data may take long a long time to submit to/retrieve from a database. With asynchronous programming, the user can move to another screen while the function continues to execute.
